name: Drumball
description:
Drumball is a unique musical toy. Drag beats across the surface of your Drumball sphere, selecting from Kick, Snare, Clap, Tom and Ping sound effects.

Then, simply set the sphere spinning with a swipe of your finger, and let the mesmerising rhythms begin...

With millions of possible combinations of beat positions, you'll never get the same sounds twice, and with a selection of themed drum kits and metronomes included you'll be able to create whatever suits your mood...

* Five themed drum kits
* Five metronome background tracks
* High resolution graphics
* Spin the Drumball by swiping your finger across the screen
* Poke and prod the beats into position
* Spin the Drumball faster or slower to change tempo
* Easily create your own rhythmic compositions...
* ... or get the Drumball to rustle up some random beats!
